name.en-US: GNU General Public License v3.0 only

description.en-US: Text fragment (#:~:text) allow linking directly to a specific portion of text in a web document, without requiring the author to annotate it with an ID, using particular syntax in the URL fragment. it could be used to generate more effective content-sharing links for users to pass to one another. Notes: * Firefox for Android currently does not support the context menu, you need to click on the extension icon instead. Specification: * https://wicg.github.io/scroll-to-text-fragment/ This extension is open source and you can file bug reports on the GitHub issue.

summary.en-US: Auto scroll to text fragment (#:~:text) and allow you to create link for selected text.
summary.es: Desplazamiento automático al fragmento de texto (#:~:text) y permite crear un enlace para el texto seleccionado.
summary.id: Gulir otomatis ke fragmen teks (#:~:text) dan memungkinkan Anda membuat tautan untuk teks yang dipilih.
summary.ja: テキストフラグメント（#:~:text）へ自動スクロールし、選択したテキストにリンクを作成することができます。
summary.ko: 텍스트 조각(#:~:text)으로 자동 스크롤하고 선택된 텍스트에 대한 링크를 생성할 수 있습니다.
summary.pl: Role automaticamente para o fragmento de texto (#:~:text) e permita que você crie um link para o texto selecionado.
summary.ru: Автоматическая прокрутка к фрагменту текста (#:~:text) и возможность создать ссылку на выделенный текст.
summary.tr: Metin parçasına (#:~:text) otomatik kaydırma yapar ve seçili metin için bağlantı oluşturmanıza izin verir.
summary.zh-CN: 自动滚动到文本片段 (#:~:text) 并允许你为选定文本创建链接。
